metadata.title: CVE-2022-31783 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Liblouis 3.21.0 has an out-of-bounds write in compileRule incompileTranslationTable.c, as demonstrated by lou_trace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
liblouis-data - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
liblouis14 - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
python3-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4').
